1{-# LANGUAGE ScopedTypeVariables #-}
2{-# LANGUAGE ViewPatterns #-}
3{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall -fno-warn-orphans #-}
4
5-- | Decode and encode of decimals.
6--
7--   [Decimal]
8--     Head Int Frac ? Tail
9--   [Head]
10--     Sign ...
11--   [Int]
12--     Digit ...
13--   [Frac]
14--     Separator Digit ...
15--   [Tail]
16--     Sign ...
17--   [Sign]
18--     Space | @"-"@ | @"+"@
19--   [Digit]
20--     Space | @"0"@ | ... | @"9"@ | @"a"@ | ... | @"z"@ | @\"A\"@ | ... | @\"Z\"@
21--   [Separator]
22--     @"."@
23--   [Space]
24--     @" "@
25
26module Koshucode.Baala.Type.Decimal.Coder
27  ( -- * Decode
28    DecodeAb,
29    decodeBinary,
30    decodeOctal,
31    decodeDecimal,
32    decodeHex,
33    decodeBase,
34  
35    -- * Encode
36    encodeDecimal,
37    encodeDecimalCompact,
38  ) where
39
40import qualified Data.Char                                  as Ch
41import qualified Data.Ratio                                 as R
42import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                   as O
43import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                       as B
44import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type.Decimal.Decimal       as T
45import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type.Decimal.Fraction      as T
46import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type.Decimal.Rational      as T
47import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type.Message               as Msg
48
49
50-- ----------------------  Decode
51
52-- | Decode to @a@.
53type DecodeAb t a = t -> B.Ab a
54
55type Sign = O.Map T.DecimalInteger
56
57-- | Decode base-2 digits to decimal.
58decodeBinary :: (O.Textual t) => DecodeAb t T.Decimal
59decodeBinary = decodeBase 2
60
61-- | Decode base-8 digits to decimal.
62decodeOctal :: (O.Textual t) => DecodeAb t T.Decimal
63decodeOctal = decodeBase 8
64
65-- | Decode decimals.
66--
67-- >>> decodeDecimal "11"
68-- Right Decimal (0) 11
69--
70-- >>> decodeDecimal "-12 345.00"
71-- Right Decimal (2) -12345
72--
73-- >>> decodeDecimal "11.250 +"
74-- Right Decimal (3) 11 + 1 % 4
75
76decodeDecimal ::(O.Textual t) => DecodeAb t T.Decimal
77decodeDecimal = decodeBase 10
78
79-- | Decode base-16 digits to decimal.
80decodeHex :: (O.Textual t) => DecodeAb t T.Decimal
81decodeHex = decodeBase 16
82
83-- | Decode digits to number.
84decodeBase :: forall t. (O.Textual t) => Integer -> DecodeAb t T.Decimal
85decodeBase base ccs = headPart id ccs where
86    minus x = - x
87
88    headPart sign (O.tCut -> O.Jp c cs) = case c of
89        ' '  -> headPart sign  cs
90        '-'  -> headPart minus cs
91        '+'  -> headPart sign  cs
92        _    -> intPart  sign  0 (O.tAdd c cs)
93    headPart _ _ = Msg.notNumber ccs
94
95    intPart :: Sign -> T.DecimalInteger -> DecodeAb t T.Decimal
96    intPart sign n (O.tCut -> O.Jp c cs)
97        = case digitToInteger c of
98            Just i           -> do n' <- up c i n
99                                   intPart  sign n' cs
100            Nothing | c == ' '  -> intPart  sign n cs
101                    | c == 'o'  -> ooPart   sign (-1) n cs
102                    | c == '.'  -> fracPart sign n 0 cs
103                    | otherwise -> tailPart sign (n, 0) (O.tAdd c cs)
104    intPart sign n _ = decimal 0 (sign n)
105
106    ooPart :: Sign -> T.DecimalFracle -> T.DecimalInteger-> DecodeAb t T.Decimal
107    ooPart sign l n (O.tCut -> O.Jp c cs)
108        | c == ' '   = ooPart   sign l n cs
109        | c == 'o'   = ooPart   sign (l - 1) n cs
110        | otherwise  = tailPart sign (n, l) (O.tAdd c cs)
111    ooPart sign l n _ = decimal l (sign n)
112
113    fracPart :: Sign -> T.DecimalInteger -> T.DecimalFracle -> DecodeAb t T.Decimal
114    fracPart sign n f (O.tCut -> O.Jp c cs)
115        = case digitToInteger c of
116            Just i           -> do n' <- up c i n
117                                   fracPart sign n' (f + 1) cs
118            Nothing | c == ' '  -> fracPart sign n f cs
119                    | otherwise -> tailPart sign (n, f) (O.tAdd c cs)
120    fracPart sign n f _ = decimal f (sign n)
121
122    tailPart :: Sign -> (T.DecimalInteger, T.DecimalFracle) -> DecodeAb t T.Decimal
123    tailPart sign dec (O.tCut -> O.Jp c cs) = case c of
124        ' '  -> tailPart sign  dec cs
125        '-'  -> tailPart minus dec cs
126        '+'  -> tailPart id    dec cs
127        'a'  -> tailPart sign  dec cs
128        'A'  -> tailPart sign  dec cs
129        _    -> Msg.notNumber ccs
130    tailPart sign (n, f) _ = decimal f (sign n)
131
132    up c i n | i < base   = Right $ base * n + i
133             | otherwise  = Msg.tooLargeDigit [c]
134
135    decimal l n = Right $ T.Decimal { T.decimalFracle = l
136                                    , T.decimalRatio  = r l }
137        where n'  = n T.%% 1
138              r 0 = n'
139              r _ = n' * T.ratioFracle l
140
141digitToInteger :: Char -> Maybe Integer
142digitToInteger c
143    | between '0' '9'  = Just $ i - ord '0'
144    | between 'a' 'f'  = Just $ i - ord 'a' + 10
145    | between 'A' 'F'  = Just $ i - ord 'A' + 10
146    | otherwise        = Nothing
147    where between a z = c >= a && c <= z
148          i = ord c
149
150ord :: Char -> Integer
151ord = fromIntegral. Ch.ord
152
153
154-- ----------------------  Encode
155
156instance B.MixEncode T.Decimal where
157    mixTransEncode _ dec = B.mixString $ encodeDecimal dec
158
159separator :: O.StringMap
160separator ""            = ""
161separator [c]           = [c]
162separator cs@(' ' : _)  = cs
163separator cs            = ' ' : cs
164
165-- | Encode decimals.
166--
167-- >>> encodeDecimal $ T.realDecimal 0 (12345 T.%% 10)
168-- "1 234"
169--
170-- >>> encodeDecimal $ T.realDecimal 2 (12345 T.%% 10)
171-- "1 234.50"
172--
173-- >>> encodeDecimal $ T.realDecimal (-2) (12345 T.%% 10)
174-- "1 2oo"
175
176encodeDecimal :: T.Decimal -> String
177encodeDecimal = encodeDecimalWith separator
178
179-- | Encode decimals without spaces.
180encodeDecimalCompact :: T.Decimal -> String
181encodeDecimalCompact = encodeDecimalWith id
182
183encodeDecimalWith :: O.StringMap -> T.Decimal -> String
184encodeDecimalWith sep = encode . T.decimalRoundOut where
185    encode T.Decimal { T.decimalFracle = l, T.decimalRatio = r } =
186        decimalSign r $ case ratioDigits sep l $ abs r of
187                          (int, frac) | l > 0      -> int ++ "." ++ frac
188                                      | otherwise  -> int
189
190decimalSign :: T.DecimalRatio -> O.StringMap
191decimalSign r cs | r < 0      = '-' : cs
192                 | otherwise  = cs
193
194ratioDigits :: (Integral n) => O.StringMap -> T.DecimalFracle -> R.Ratio n -> (String, String)
195ratioDigits sep l r = case properFraction r of
196                        (i, r') -> (integerDigits sep l i, fracDigits sep l r')
197
198integerDigits :: O.StringMap -> T.DecimalFracle -> Integer -> String
199integerDigits sep = loop 0 "" where
200    loop :: Int -> String -> T.DecimalFracle -> Integer -> String
201    loop n cs l i
202        | i == 0  = if null cs then "0" else cs
203        | n == 3  = loop 0 (sep cs) l i
204        | i > 0   = case i `quotRem` 10 of
205                      (q, r) -> loop (n + 1) (up l r : cs) (l + 1) q
206        | otherwise = cs
207
208    up l r | l < 0      = 'o'
209           | otherwise  = Ch.intToDigit (fromInteger r)
210
211fracDigits :: (Integral n) => O.StringMap -> T.DecimalFracle -> R.Ratio n -> String
212fracDigits sep = loop (0 :: Int) where
213    loop n l 0 = fill n l
214    loop _ 0 _ = ""
215    loop 3 l r = sep $ loop 0 l r
216    loop n l r = case properFraction $ 10 * r of
217                   (i, r') -> Ch.intToDigit i : loop (n + 1) (l - 1) r'
218
219    fill 3 l              = sep $ fill 0 l
220    fill n l | l > 0      = '0' : fill (n + 1) (l - 1)
221             | otherwise  = ""
222
